metadata.title: DPM Ishaq Dar for further deepening Pakistan-Japan relations

content.article_body:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 20 (APP): Japanese Ambassador Akamatsu Shuichi Monday called on Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar and exchanged views on key regional and international developments.

During the meeting, the DPM/FM encouraged efforts to further deepen Pakistan-Japan relations across diverse areas.
